data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I would react gently when someone is being rude to me. It is partly because I am a mild and easy-going person, and thus I would hardly be literally angry with anybody. The other reason is that acting in an aggressive manner towards someone who is rude to me, in my opinion, would not help ease the situation but could potentially worsen it, which would be the last thing I would like to see. In that case, neither of the two parties would likely be able to step out of the tense situation in order to arrive at a reconciliation. (100字)
data.referenceText: How do you react when someone is rude to you?
data.referenceTranslate: 当有人对你无礼时，你会作何反应?
